vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Vulnerability: insecure_random
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use cryptographically secure random (secrets module)

vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Vulnerability: hardcoded_password
vulnerabilities.remediation: Remove hardcoded password, use environment variables

vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Vulnerability: insecure_hash
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use secure hash algorithms (SHA-256, bcrypt, argon2)
